body.p: For the purposes of the transition requirements in paragraphs C1 and C3–C33:

li.p: the date of initial application is the beginning of the annual reporting period in which an entity first applies IFRS 17; and
the transition date is the beginning of the annual reporting period immediately preceding the date of initial application.
